member.name: T:Dascoba.Umb.ImageResizer.AfterSaveHandler
member.summary:
AfterSaveHandler
Used when media is created by some other means besides the standard backoffice method that creates a single media at a time. (i.e. via the API)
Doesn't currently work since Umbraco only hits the AfterSave event on single items in the backoffice
